titlStmt.titl: Continuous In-situ Measurements of Anchor Ice Formation, Growth and Release Mechanisms in Rivers

citation.biblCit: Ghobrial, Tadros; Loewen, Mark, 2019, "Continuous In-situ Measurements of Anchor Ice Formation, Growth and Release Mechanisms in Rivers", https://doi.org/10.7939/DVN/6X5ATL, UAL Dataverse, V1

titlStmt.titl: Continuous In-situ Measurements of Anchor Ice Formation, Growth and Release Mechanisms in Rivers

stdyInfo.abstract: for the first time, time-lapse images of the formation, growth and release mechanisms of anchor ice in rivers were captured.

citation.biblCit: Ghobrial et al., 2019. In-situ measurements of anchor ice formation and release, In proceedings of the CGU HS Committee on River Ice Processes and the Environment 20th Workshop on the Hydraulics of Ice Covered Rivers., Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, May 14-16, 2019.
